WorkItem.Description:
I think it could be better to make this path case insensitive. Currently (0.9.5.0) path for import of AMD modules is case sensitive and it's a bit confusing (especially if Windows system folder structure and URLs are case insensitive).

Let's say I have the following project structure

```
| 
+-- Services
|       +-- service.ts  
+-- FolderName
        +-- test.ts
```

__service.ts:__

```
//This is correct:
import sth1 = require("../FolderName/test");

//This is incorrect (Unable to resolve external module)
import sth2 = require("../foldername/test");
```
WorkItem.Summary: Case-insensitive path for import of AMD modules

Comments.Message: Require js treats modules "a" and "A" differently which is why I always use lowercase for my requires.
